values.value:
Cancellations & Refunds

Program Refund & Cancellation Policy

I understand and agree to the following:

(a) Full Program: If a host school cancels a placement, Greenheart Exchange will work to find a new placement for the participant, but a new placement cannot be guaranteed. If Greenheart Exchange cannot find a new placement for the participant, the participant will be issued a program refund.

(b) Self-Placed: If the host school cancels or rescinds their job offer, the participant may choose to upgrade to the Full Program option, or receive a refund of their program fee less the cancellation fees below.

(c) Visa Denials: Applicants who are accepted to the program but denied a visa by the U.S. Embassy are allowed a special cancellation fee. Evidence of the visa denial in the form of a returned DS-2019 form (or other evidence provided and signed by the U.S. Embassy/Consulate) must be forwarded to Greenheart Exchange to receive a refund.

(d) Participants are responsible for keeping Greenheart Exchange informed about their visa status throughout the visa application process. Failure to notify Greenheart Exchange about a visa denial will result in forfeiture of the program fee.

(e) Visa Interview Dates: If the visa interview is scheduled for a date after the program start date, the participant must contact Greenheart Exchange Greenheart Exchange will only honor the cancellation refund policy if the participant notifies Greenheart Exchange about the visa interview date prior to the program start date and has clearly kept Greenheart Exchange informed of their visa status throughout the process.
